FuncDef:
The set flow-change-ratio start-check bandwidth-usage command specifies the percentage of flow to start flow-change-alarm check.
The undo set flow-change-ratio start-check bandwidth-usage command restores the default setting. The set flow-change-ratio start-check bandwidth-usage command specifies the percentage of flow to start flow-change-alarm check. The undo set flow-change-ratio start-check bandwidth-usage command restores the default setting. By default, the percentage of interface bandwidth usage is 20% to start flow-change-alarm check.
ParentView: Layer 2 100GE interface view,100GE interface view,Layer 2 10GE interface view,10GE interface view,Layer 2 200GE interface view,200GE interface view,25GE-L2 view,25GE interface view,400GE-L2 view,400GE interface view,Layer 2 50GE interface view,50GE interface view,Interface group view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the percentage of interface bandwidth usage to start flow-change-alarm check.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 100, in percentage. The default value is 20.
